scripts.dev: bun run kill-all && bun run --filter '*' dev
scripts.dev:elysia: bun x kill-port 3000 && bun run --filter @app/elysia dev
scripts.dev:react: bun x kill-port 5173 && bun run --filter @app/react-electron dev:vite
scripts.dev:electron: bun x kill-port 5173 && bun run --filter @app/react-electron dev:electron
scripts.clean: bun x rimraf node_modules apps/*/node_modules packages/*/node_modules dist
